Bash(git -C /Users/johnlyman/Desktop/the-rock-salt commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add automated event curation system

FEATURES:
- Bandsintown API integration for artist tour dates
- Songkick API integration for venue-based events  
- Event curator that syncs Utah shows to database
- Vercel cron job running every 6 hours
- Smart venue matching and auto-creation
- Deduplication using external IDs
- Manual sync endpoint for immediate updates

IMPLEMENTATION:
- /api/cron/sync-events - Cron endpoint
- src/lib/events/bandsintown.ts - Bandsintown API client
- src/lib/events/songkick.ts - Songkick API client
- src/lib/events/curator.ts - Event sync and curation logic
- Database migration for external tracking fields
- vercel.json cron configuration (every 6 hours)

SETUP:
- Bandsintown works out of the box (app_id: therocksalt)
- Songkick requires API key in env
- Optional CRON_SECRET for endpoint security
- See EVENT_CURATION_SETUP.md for full instructions

RESULT:
- Calendar automatically populates with real Utah shows
- Events from multiple sources unified in database
- Manual submissions still supported
- Homepage shows real upcoming events

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
